description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，经济学者。曾任中共重庆市委副书记、重庆市人民政府市长、全国人大财经委员会副主任委员。因其在重庆任内的经济发展和房价控制方面的表现而知名。
description.en: Chinese politician and economist. He served as the Deputy Party Secretary of Chongqing, Mayor of Chongqing, and Vice Chairman of the Finance and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress. He is known for his performance in economic development and housing price control during his tenure in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆的前任重庆市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Huang Qifan as Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆的重庆市市长继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Huang Qifan as Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆在重庆任市长时的中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Chongqing while Huang Qifan was the mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆在重庆任市长时的中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Chongqing while Huang Qifan was the mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆在重庆任市长时的中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Chongqing while Huang Qifan was the mayor.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆之子。
description.en: Son of Huang Qifan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, then President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆在上海任职时期的中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Shanghai during Huang Qifan's tenure there.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄奇帆在上海任职时期的中共上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Shanghai during Huang Qifan's tenure there.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国重庆市的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Chongqing, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher learning located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所商学院。
description.en: A business school located in Shanghai, China.

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2012年至2017年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2012 to 2017.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议重庆市委员会。
description.en: The Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在1998年上海本地股重组工作中创造性地推出的一个资本运作概念。
description.en: A capital operation concept creatively introduced by Huang Qifan during the restructuring of local Shanghai stocks in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省绍兴市下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Shaoxing, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 16岁时受文化大革命影响，黄奇帆被迫辍学进入工厂当工人。
description.en: At the age of 16, affected by the Cultural Revolution, Huang Qifan was forced to drop out of school and become a factory worker.

description.zh-cn: 1974年被推荐到原上海机械学院仪器仪表系自动化仪表专业学习。
description.en: In 1974, he was recommended to study in the Automation Instrumentation major of the Instrumentation Department at the former Shanghai Institute of Mechanical Engineering.

relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央任命黄奇帆为中共重庆市委副书记，提名为重庆市市长候选人。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee appointed Huang Qifan as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee and nominated him as a candidate for Mayor of Chongqing.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
中国共产党第十八届中央委员会
全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在薄熙来担任中共重庆市委书记期间任重庆市市长。
description.en: Huang Qifan served as the Mayor of Chongqing while Bo Xilai was the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在张德江担任中共重庆市委书记期间任重庆市市长。
description.en: Huang Qifan served as the Mayor of Chongqing while Zhang Dejiang was the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在孙政才担任中共重庆市委书记期间任重庆市市长。
description.en: Huang Qifan served as the Mayor of Chongqing while Sun Zhengcai was the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，在黄奇帆辞去市长职务时，其工作得到了时任市委书记孙政才的高度评价。
description.en: Reportedly, when Huang Qifan resigned as mayor, his work was highly praised by then-Party Secretary Sun Zhengcai.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在上海任职期间，吴邦国是中共上海市委书记。
description.en: During Huang Qifan's tenure in Shanghai, Wu Bangguo was the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆在上海任职期间，黄菊是中共上海市委书记。
description.en: During Huang Qifan's tenure in Shanghai, Huang Ju was the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 黄奇帆接替王鸿举担任中共重庆市委副书记及重庆市市长职务。
description.en: Huang Qifan succeeded Wang Hongju as the Deputy Party Secretary and Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 张国清接替黄奇帆担任重庆市市长职务。
description.en: Zhang Guoqing succeeded Huang Qifan as the Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 陪同中华人民共和国主席习近平访问美国。
description.en: Accompanied President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping on a visit to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 在1998年上海本地股重组工作中，黄奇帆创造性地推出了“净壳”概念。
description.en: During the restructuring of local Shanghai stocks in 1998, Huang Qifan creatively introduced the concept of "Net Shell".
